content.about_us_heading2: is a part of Mithkal Minds Private Limited in Nashik, offering Software as a Service (SaaS) solutions. At Qviple, we help educational institutions of all sizes embrace technology to enhance their education quality. We're always advancing to stay ahead. Our solutions use the latest technology to boost your productivity and help you achieve your goals. Plus, we're committed to making your institute eco-friendly with a 100% Paper-Free Process. Embracing technology is at the heart of what we do.
content.about_us_sub_text: Our enthusiastic team is the backbone of our organization. With a passion for technology and a deep commitment to customer satisfaction, they stand ready to support you every step of the way.
content.about_us_sub_text2: Join Qviple today and embark on a journey towards a brighter, greener, and more inclusive future for education. Together, we can make a difference.

content.accordion_answer1: We believe in embracing everyone, so the services are free of cost for lifetime if registered within offer time. (Free services include all necessary features for working of institute, add ons will be paid in future, Above mention features will be free for lifetime)
content.join_staff_question: How to join institute as staff ?
content.joint_staff_step2: Create new account / log in to your account(If already have an account)
content.joint_staff_step8: Enter institute code provided by institutes
content.joint_staff_step10: Wait for approval from institute (See status in Members Tab next to Home)
content.join_student_question: How to join institute as student ?
content.joint_student_step2: Create new account / log in to your account(If already have an account)
content.joint_student_step8: Enter class code provided by institutes
content.joint_student_step10: Wait for approval from institute (See status in Members Tab next to Home)
